comment: оставляем на Сантиэле по любой причине

languages.text: "Мы остаемся здесь? Как и должно. Замаливать грехи до последнего вздоха — вот наш удел".

traits.locale_text: "Мы остаемся здесь? Как и должно. Замаливать грехи до последнего вздоха — вот наш удел".

languages.text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."
languages.original_text: "Мы остаемся здесь? Как и должно. Замаливать грехи до последнего вздоха — вот наш удел".

traits.locale_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our sins until our last breath — that is our lot."
"You... You should talk to the elders."
"We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our sins until our last breath — that is our lot."
"We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our sins until our last breath — that is our lot."
"We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

languages.text: “我们为什么要留在这里？因为我们就该留在这里。我们必须为我们的过错赎罪，直到咽气为止，这就是我们的命运。”
languages.original_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

traits.locale_text: “我们为什么要留在这里？因为我们就该留在这里。我们必须为我们的过错赎罪，直到咽气为止，这就是我们的命运。”

languages.text: «¿Nos quedamos aquí? Es lo que tenemos que hacer. Debemos expiar nuestros errores hasta el último aliento».
languages.original_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

traits.locale_text: «¿Nos quedamos aquí? Es lo que tenemos que hacer. Debemos expiar nuestros errores hasta el último aliento».

languages.text: 「ここに留まるつもりだが？そうすべきなのだ。最後の一呼吸まで我々の過ちを償い続けよう――それが我らが定め」
languages.original_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに留まるつもりだが？そうすべきなのだ。最後の一呼吸まで我々の過ちを償い続けよう――それが我らが定め」

languages.text: « On va rester là ? Enfin, c'est normal, après tout. On doit racheter nos erreurs jusqu'à notre dernier souffle... C'est comme ça. »
languages.original_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

traits.locale_text: « On va rester là ? Enfin, c'est normal, après tout. On doit racheter nos erreurs jusqu'à notre dernier souffle... C'est comme ça. »

languages.text: "Wir bleiben hier? Das sollten wir auch. Buße tun für unsere Fehler bis zum letzten Atemzug – das ist unser Los."
languages.original_text: "We're staying here? As we should be. Atoning for our wrongs until our last breath — that is our lot."

traits.locale_text: "Wir bleiben hier? Das sollten wir auch. Buße tun für unsere Fehler bis zum letzten Atemzug – das ist unser Los."
